scripts.headed: npm run prereport && npx cypress run --headed
scripts.headless: npm run prereport && npx cypress run
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress:e2e: npm run headless; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.cypress:headed: npm run headed; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
